commit.message:
Makefile.in: Rebuilt.

	* Makefile.in: Rebuilt.
	* Makefile.am (install-exec-hook): Only make a single symlink, and
	remove the destination before making the link.
	* configure: Rebuilt.
	* configure.in: Call AC_PROG_LN_S.

From-SVN: r37189

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,11 @@
+2000-11-01  Tom Tromey  <tromey@cygnus.com>
+
+	* Makefile.in: Rebuilt.
+	* Makefile.am (install-exec-hook): Only make a single symlink, and
+	remove the destination before making the link.
+	* configure: Rebuilt.
+	* configure.in: Call AC_PROG_LN_S.
+
 2000-10-31  Warren Levy  <warrenl@cygnus.com>
 
 	* jni.cc: Added include of java/lang/ThreadGroup.h.

@@ -152,10 +152,8 @@ libgcjx_la_LINK = $(LIBLINK)
 install-exec-hook:
 	cd $(DESTDIR)$(libdir) && \
 	if test -f libgcjx.la; then \
-	  for f in libgcjx*; do \
-	    t=`echo $$f | sed -e 's/libgcjx/gnu-awt-xlib/'`; \
-	    ln -s $$f $$t; \
-	  done; \
+	  rm -f gnu-awt-xlib.so; \
+	  $(LN_S) libgcjx.so gnu-awt-xlib.so; \
 	fi
